Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory285.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're almost done searching the area, but we didn't turn up any clues.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is all we can see on the map. Where should we go next?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Just when everyone is at a loss, a flustered researcher catches everyone's attention."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Flustered Researcher', 3: 'Excuse me. Have you seen this person?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She pulls out a picture and asks around the scavengers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger', 3: "You damn fancy folks with your fancy jobs! If you're lookin' for someone, why doncha go ask your damn watchdogs!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Flustered Researcher', 3: "S-sorry, this is personal. I can't ask security for help.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Flustered Researcher', 3: 'P-please... Help me...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing this, the scavenger squatting in the corner takes the photo and glances at it.'}
{2: 'Scavenger', 3: "Oh, this gal. I can give you the scoop, but what's in it for me?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The flustered researcher takes out a bag of compressed biscuits from her pocket and hands it to the scavenger. He quickly rips open the bag and swallows them whole.'}
{2: 'Scavenger', 3: 'I just saw her go that way.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The researcher thanks the scavenger, then runs in the direction he was pointing. He smacks his lips and sneers.'}
{2: 'Scavenger', 3: "Heh, I didn't see nothin'.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "By the look of the scavenger and researcher, this must've happened quite a long time ago.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'There are no clues that match the key intel here. Should we take a chance?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory4.jpg'}
{3: "Following the researcher's projection, you all arrive at a dark alley..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "We haven't searched this area yet...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The entrance is well hiddenâ€”looks intentional.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'See if there are any records here.', 3: '43'}
{3: 'After inputting the key intel into the Spear of F.O.S., the researcher reappears in front of you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She has not run down the alley for long before embracing a Construct and cries.'}
{2: 'Flustered Researcher', 3: 'Sister!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'She found her even though he just pointed in a random direction... Was it because she kept narrowing her search?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Family members share a certain bond.', 3: '57'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's not that strange. Growing up with someone makes it easier to predict where they'll go. After all, you're familiar with their habits and how they think.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Really? I don't have any practical experience in this matter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You don't have any siblings, Liv?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I have brothers and sisters, but we're not related by blood.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If we did, maybe it would've been better...", 4: '1'}
{2: "(Lucia no longer understands what Luna's thinking.)", 3: '67', 4: "(Lucia's been separated from her sister for too long.)", 5: '67'}
{1: '1', 3: "At that moment, the Construct in the researcher's arms turns around and gives a look of surprise."}
{2: 'Female Construct', 3: "Who are... Oh, you're Liadrin's little sister... Angel, right?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Construct', 3: "It's you. How did you know she's here?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: "Where is she?! Why haven't I heard from her for so long? Her locator pinpoints her near this area... That's the only reason I've found this place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Construct', 3: "Didn't anyone tell you? She was wounded in battle and switched bodies in order to recover. I saw her go out this morning. Maybe she's on a mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Does she still remember me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Construct', 3: 'I don\'t think her memory data was damaged. She said "Hi" to me last night.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Construct', 3: "If you don't feel at ease, just wait for her here. I need to get going. I'm still on a mission.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She waves goodbye and leaves. Angel breathes a sigh of relief and sinks to the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Seems likes she's worried about her sister... And as a researcher, the fact that her sister is a Construct...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...She must have her own reasons.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Angel stands up and pats the dirt off her knees. Just as she is about to walk to a nearby bench, her comms rings.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angel', 3: 'A message... Sister?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She opens the message in a hurry. The four of you onlookers step forward and look carefully at the words on the screen.'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "Sorry I haven't been in touch with you for so long, Angel."}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'I was wounded in battle a few days ago. When I was at the rescue camp, I saw a winged mechanical angel. He told me about a power known as the Ascension-Network.'}
{2: 'A winged...', 3: '104', 4: '(You feel a pain in your chest.)', 5: '104'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "We were both researchers, but when we ran out of test subjects, they used me instead. Since then, I haven't been able to continue with my research..."}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "But now, I've been presented an opportunity to research the Punishing Virus. So, I've accepted his invitation."}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'Farewell, Angel. I hope we see each other again in this life.'}
{3: 'After reading the message, Angel staggers backward a few steps and falls to the ground again.'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: '...The Ascension-Network?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even though she does not know what she is talking about, she can still sense the danger.'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Sister... I will find you. I WILL!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Angel stands up, ignoring the dust on her body, turns back and dials a number in her contacts.'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: "It's me, Angel. Requesting permission to locate Liadrin.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Permission denied, Angel. How many times have I told you? Quit getting involved with your sister. You'll only hinder her in battle. I know it was against your wishes for her to become a Construct.", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'But, think about your future career. You know what unemployment looks like.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: "Hmph, then I won't beat around the bush. She's gone AWOL. Do you know where she is now?", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'What?! Do you have any proof?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Try contacting her.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Alright, wait a moment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Shortly after, her comms rings again.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "...I can't reach her. I don't know what happened, but I'm going to dispatch a team to help you look for her.", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "For your sake, I hope she comes back to her senses. After all, your sister is quite an accomplished soldier. We've put her talents in high regard.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: "Not long after terminating the call, three Constructs arrive by car. The car's navigation system clearly displays the coordinates of their destination."}
{3: 'Angel enters the car and proceeds en route to their destination, quickly disappearing out of sight.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: "Finally, we've found a clue.", 3: '137'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like they went here. Let's get going, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "But do you think she'll be able to find her sister?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "If this really is the Ascendants' headquarters, I'm afraid this doesn't look good.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Liv clenches her hands and gives a look of sadness.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Blood is complicated. When you grow up together, it brings you closer to one another... but in times like this, it also pushes you to the abyss.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'This is the second time Lucia says this word. Is she still thinking about what happened to her sister, Luna?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm here, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you thinking about your sister?', 3: '153', 4: 'Did this topic remind you of something?', 5: '153'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't understand. Why did Luna become an Ascendant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I heard that she was disposed of after failing to become a Construct. Did something happen?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why is she with another me? If she is me... why did she choose to become an Ascendant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Maybe she went through something that you didn't.", 3: '158'}
{2: 'The same person with different experiences...', 3: '160'}
{2: '...will make different choices.', 3: '161'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Different experiences?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "If they could do it again... If they could live in a gentle environment... They wouldn't have chosen this path, would they?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Your choice is proof of that.', 3: '164'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...If only I could know what she went through, I might be able to understand why she made this choice.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia looks up and stretches her hand toward the distant sky. The sun hiding behind the clouds struggles to shine a ray of light between her fingers.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If I find out from her memories that all of this is a lie... and that my purpose belongs somewhere else...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Will I become someone like her?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are you sure, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I believe in you.', 3: '176'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If I really did, what would you do?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing this, she places her outreached hand on her heart. Her smile shows signs of doubt and bitterness.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "She and I are the same person. I wouldn't be surprised if we'd make the same decision. Do you really believe in me?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Yes, I'm sure she would make the same decisions as you.", 3: '179'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You mean... If she had the same experiences as I have, she would also be standing here as a member of the Gray Ravens?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Your affirmation does little to assuage Lucia of her worries.'}
{3: 'Confusion of the unknown, the fear of loss, the possibility of parting after uncovering the truth...'}
{3: 'All these worries cloud her heart, much like the sun above.'}
{2: 'Whatever happens in the end...', 3: '184'}
{2: 'I will respect your decision, Lucia.', 3: '185'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia nods. Although the worries in her eyes remain, her smile widens faintly.'}
{3: 'She turns and leads the rest of you to the target location.'}
{3: 'Her pace continues to be firm in conviction and, like a raven aimed at its target, she spreads her wings and soars into the cloud-covered sky.'}
